title: Associations of Early Life Ambient PM
abstract: To examine whether exposure to fine particulate matter (PM We conducted a retrospective cohort study of 337 infants with BPD, born between 2010 and 2019, who survived to discharge with clinical follow-up in the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia Care Network through age 5.
